name: OBM
description:
Can you play a rhythm game using only one button? In OBM you can, thanks to weekly Game Jam 165 for the theme of One Button Mash.

Collect the healthy food by pressing any button, but make sure to avoid the unhealthy food. Get consecutive hits in a row to increase your multiplier.

Special Thanks for allowing me to use these free assets:

https://www.silvermansound.com/free-music/chipstep
https://www.dafont.com/karmatic-arcade.font
https://opengameart.org/content/icons-food
https://craftpix.net/freebies/free-horizontal-2d-game-backgrounds/
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/particle-pack
https://www.kenney.nl/assets/animal-pack-redux
https://www.gameart2d.com/free-casual-game-button-pack.html
